page.title: 15Bee Keeping, The Narth. .2.
page.content: There are 3 types of bees; a queen bee who only lays eggs, the worker who collects the pollen and honey and rears the young, and the drones or male bees whose only job is to fertilise the queens. We have 2 bee hives or swarms of bees which contain about 30000 bees each and they fly about 2 miles away from our hives hunting for nectar and pollen. Types of pollen are; April -Willow May -Cherry, Apple, Chestnut Dandelion June -Raspberry, Beans, Clover, Currants July -Lime and Brambles August -Heather Sept -Heather October-Ivy Our hives may give 60 jars of honey.
